EDIT_COLLECTION_PAGE_FORM_FIELD_LOGO_SUB: This image will be used for navigation. 350 x 350 recommended.
EDIT_COLLECTION_PAGE_FORM_FIELD_FEATURED: This image will be used for featuring your collection on the homepage, category pages, or other promotional areas. 600 x 400 recommended.
EDIT_COLLECTION_PAGE_FORM_FIELD_BANNER_S: This image will appear at the top of your collection page. Avoid including too much text in this banner image, as the dimensions change on different devices. 1400 x 400 recommended.
EDIT_COLLECTION_PAGE_FORM_FIELD_CATEGORY: Choosing a category will help make you item discoverable on Matrix Market.
EDIT_COLLECTION_PAGE_FORM_FIELD_COLLABOR: Collaborators can modify collection settings, receive payments for items they created, change the collection's creator earnings payout address, and create new items.
EDIT_COLLECTION_PAGE_NOT_OWNER: The owner of this collection is not you, and will be backed out in 3 seconds
EDIT_COLLECTION_PAGE_FAILED_TO_GET_DETAI: Error white get collection detail, and will be backed out in 3 seconds
CREATE_PAGE_NAME_INVALID: Name is invalidï¼Œinput value does not conform to variable naming conventions
